title: Login issue, stuck on Authenticating. EU West
body:
Hey, I am unable to connect to the Authenticating server after the small patch that hit today, May 11 2017, around 7:25PM GMT+2, after being able to play perfectly fine the day before.

The first time I tried to login today I got into the game client, I sent my friend a message using the in client chat and I clicked Play to enter a game, but the client was none responsive and then I got the lost connection screen, trying to reconnect etc.  But it never reconnected me so I closed the client and now I'm stuck at said problem.

I read through the support things on possible fixes but none of them seem to work and I think it might be a ISP issue like I saw people using Frontier.
My firewall settings or modem settings have not changed since yesterday, all I did was accept the firewall to let LoL Client out on the net after the update happened, which it asks each time a game client has been updated.
I am playing on EU West from Norway with the ISP   Telenor, if that helps anything at all.

replies.body: Hey guys, I've posted a [pinned thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/8YYAt5md-eu-regions-login-chat-issues-may-11) to get some more visibility.  We're investigating this issue, but looking to grab more logs to help pinpoint it.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some logs that can be obtained by the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  This will help us take a closer look.

Just did!
I sent a support ticket with the attached log files, hope it helps!
Got the same problem also here in Denmark, but we could log in after using VPN

Have 2 mates on discord with the exact same problem.. Have tried to everything!
Playing from denmark with ISP: Ka-net
I am having the exact same problem, and I am also playing on EU west from Norway with the ISP Telenor.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Dorito please fix, I need my daily league fix.
Did you just...  x_x

Please Porocles, for the damn love of god. I have had this issue for 5 hours, I have tried all your shit on the support site, EVERYTHING. Even manually uninstall/reinstall, still doesnt f***ing work. I'm so damn pissed atm. I play your game 8-12 hours a day and this is what i get in return from riot... The support hasn't even read or touched my fking ticket!!
you could try to post the request number so it can be given to the people who need them faster
haha OMG. gr8 comment omg.. LMAO!!

Same problem here on EUNE, also from Denmark :/ have a friends that can log in *jelly much*..
Tried the to log in through the internet on my phone, worked fine, but not with my wifi, even tho I got no problems with my internet other then I can't play lol e.e
Got the same problem on EUW, but i have smurfs on NA and EUNE and i can log into both so its limited to EUW for me.
Playing on EU Nordic & East and got the same problem.

Same Problem. Also in Denmark.  Been stuck on authenticating for about 2 hours now.
But seems like all my buddy's are able to log in and play. 

Im jelly. and sad :(
Same problem for me aswell.

Thanks for the report, as well as the additional info in your other one!  It looks like there's a variety of different ISPs here, but I don't know a whole lot on what's going on yet.  This is getting looked into now, so I'll be around should I receive any updates.
So i have this problem on EUW account, but no problem with EUNE account.
Turning the router off and on again worked for me (???????)

The problem with getting stuck in the authentication phase is still persisting. Thought about playing after a 5 month break but can't log in. Tried searching through all the forums for solutions and tried everything mentioned under "connection issues", nothing, no results. When will this problem be fixed?
Playing from Denmark. ISP: Hiper.
same problem, haven't played for a week :( Poland

IT WORKS,  GOOD WORK .
thank you

ISP: telenor

Any news regarding this matter?

no. it's still the same shit as ever. This is what it was like back in the old days, every f**ing sunday in europe. and here we go again. largest game in the world has even worse servers and probably even a smaller team than  their "opponents" -.- I'm surprised they are not ashamed.
there are a lot of threads going on on the matter, some info scatred around
Same here, EUW ,London ISP: Hyperoptic

If i login with the internet from my mobile and then go into a game, then switch back to my internet then it works. But i can't Log in from my "normal" internet, and if i switch back to my "normal" internet before i'm in a game, then the client will discount me, but no problem from my mobile internet.  can this help a bit?
Same tried all also the thread about connection issue. spagetti code riot,....

I had the same problem. Have 4g mobile internet. Restarted the mobile router and now i got to login. Worth the try on landline too i guess.
